entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Weyburn
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -26.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Weyburn 10:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: -26.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -39
Dewpoint: -30.5°C
Wind: N 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
